creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two full lines of calligraphy, boldly and expressively written; shorter line with stray characters at far L
inscription: 紀の国野〇〇のみさき乃ともしび亜めりか船をてらすなりけり {Ki no kuni no Shihonomisaki no tomoshibi wa Amerika bune wo terasu narikeri} (The lighthouse / at Ki no kuni\'s / Shihonomisaki Cape / is brilliantly lit / for the American ship.) [Stephen Addiss]
title: American Ship: Waka
